name: Chronogon
description:
Play as Chrono, the god of time of his world, and ensure the world doesn't run out of it's finite resource of time. 

Hit the winding keys to wind up the world clock, if a winding key hits you before being activated you'll be stunned briefly. The world clock can only be wound so far.

WASDMoveMouseAim and shoot

Made for the Mini Jame Gam #6.
